import React from "react"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import NavigationLinks from "./NavLinks"; import ProfilePic from "./rsc/profile_img.jpg" import Linkedin from "./rsc/linkedin.jpg" import Medium from "./rsc/medium_logo.jpg" import Github from "./rsc/github.jpg" function ReferenceCard(props) { return (

{props.name}

{props.caption}

 ) } export default ReferenceCard
